name: A large barrel-shaped helmet
data: It decreases the users strength poorly.
It decreases the users dexterity adequately.
It increases the users hitpoints adequately.
It has magnificent armour class for its type (poor in general).
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration adequately.
It increases the users physical resistance somewhat.
It gives great penalty to the skill 'dodge'.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
